title: Virus-beating salmon salad
directions: Whisk olive oil, balsamic vinegar and a dash of mustard together until the mix emulsifies; season. Toss the greens with some of the dressing, then peel and thinly slice the onion.
Now for the easiest haute cuisine salmon going. Sprinkle the fillet with pepper, add a squeeze of lemon, then spread a little mustard over the top.
Grill it on a medium heat for about 6-8min. Place the salmon on top of the leaves when itâ€™s done. Throw in the dressing and the onion slices. Feed yourself better.
